forensics.title: Diagnostic Forensics
forensics.subtitle: Field Analysis Unit • Machine Health • Root Cause
forensics.drag_drop: Drag drop damage photos to analyze texture.
forensics.advice_cavitation: Critical: Surface micro-jets have removed material. Recommended: Stellite Welding overlay immediately.
forensics.advice_erosion: Warning: Sand particles polishing the surface. Recommended: Apply Ceramic Coating (Tungsten Carbide).
forensics.sand_diagnosis: Diagnosis: Silica Sand detected in Pelton Nozzle. Check desanding basin filters immediately.
forensics.seizure_risk: RISK OF SHAFT SEIZURE DETECTED. AUTO-DEPLOYING AUX COOLING PUMPS.

insights.kaplan_risk: LEGACY WARNING: Kaplan on head > 70m carries huge cavitation risk. Deep submergence (negative elevation) required.
insights.francis_inefficient: Economic Viability: Francis on head < 20m requires massive spiral case.
insights.price_suspicious: Price significantly below market. Check steel origin and reference list.
insights.efficiency_high: Suspiciously high efficiency ({{value}}%). Physical limit is around {{limit}}%. Request IEC 60041 test report.
insights.rotor_width: Rotor is wider than access road.
insights.split_rotor_required: Mandatory "Split Rotor" design (two parts) or on-site welding.
insights.kaplan_double_reg: Large flow variations. Kaplan double-regulated is good, but 2 units (1/3 + 2/3) cover minimum better.
insights.kaplan_single: Stable flow, 1 large Kaplan turbine is the cheapest option.
insights.francis_part_load: Francis has poor efficiency below 40%. Better 2 smaller units to cover low waters.

warnings.wall_thin_burst: CRITICAL: Wall thickness {{thickness}}mm insufficient for {{head}}m surge head. Safety Factor: {{sf}} (Min 1.5). Risk of BURST.
warnings.bolt_failure_46: BOLT FAILURE RISK: Class 4.6 bolts cannot withstand pressures > 25 bar. Upgrade to 8.8.
warnings.corrosion_steel: RAPID CORROSION: Unprotected steel in abrasive/dirty water will fail in < 10 years.
warnings.corrosion_paint: Maintenance Heavy: Paint will strip quickly in silty water. Consider Galvanization.

notifications.title: Notification Center
notifications.tempSpike: CRITICAL: Shaft stoppage detected but Temperature rising! Current: {{temp}}°C (Limit: {{limit}}°C)
notifications.vibrationWarning: Warning: Vibration levels approaching Zone B.

heritage_banner.title: Heritage Precision Standard
heritage_banner.alert_desc: Current alignment deviation is accelerating wear beyond design parameters.
heritage_banner.subtitle: Golden Alignment Protocol

finance.title: Risk vs. Finance
finance.profit_basis: Based on current efficiency and market rates

modules.hppBuilderDesc: Design and simulate new hydro plants.

zeroState.title: System Cold Start
zeroState.noAssets: No assets detected in local reservoir.

bearing.critical: CRITICAL: {{value}}°C exceeds safe operating limit (85°C). Immediate shutdown recommended.
bearing.warning: WARNING: {{value}}°C approaching critical threshold. Monitor closely.

alignment.critical: CRITICAL DEVIATION: {{value}} mm/m is {{ratio}}x the Golden Standard.
alignment.heritage: HERITAGE DEVIATION: {{value}} mm/m exceeds 0.05 mm/m Golden Standard.

cross_sector.thermal_stress: THERMAL CAUSALITY: Misalignment ({{alignment}} mm/m) is actively inducing {{stress}}% excess thermal load on bearings.
cross_sector.oil_degradation: ACCELERATED WEAR: Oil service life reduced by {{years}} years due to particle contamination.
cross_sector.seal_integrity: MECHANICAL EROSION: High vibration ({{value}} mm/s) is compromising seal integrity.
cross_sector.insulation_stress: ELECTRICAL STRESS: Grid instability ({{deviation}} Hz) is degrading generator insulation.

remedies.realignment: Execute Precision Laser Re-alignment to 0.05 mm/m.
remedies.shimming: Precision shimming and thrust bridge calibration.
remedies.dryout: Stator dry-out and cryogenic cleaning sequence.
remedies.oil_scraping: Execute SOP-TRIB-001: Scraping & Blueing and Oil Purification.
remedies.grease_purge: Purge grease lines and inspect seal integrity.
remedies.cooling_verify: Verify cooling water flow and jacking oil pressure.

alerts.structural_risk: Safety margin is {{margin}}%. Hoop stress ({{pressure}} Bar) vs Limit ({{limit}} Bar).
alerts.vibration_critical: Measured vibration of {{value}} mm/s exceeds the {{standard}} critical limit of {{limit}} mm/s for large machines.
alerts.bearing_critical: Bearing temperature reached {{value}}°C, exceeding the safe critical shutdown threshold of {{limit}}°C. Relative rise above ambient is {{rise}}°C.
alerts.bearing_rise: Abnormal thermal rise detected. Bearing is {{rise}}°C above ambient ({{ambient}}°C). Even if below absolute limits, this indicates a lubrication or friction issue.
alerts.alignment_breach: PRECISION BREACH: Measured {{value}} mm/m exceeds strict {{limit}} mm/m Golden Standard. Based on the cubic relationship of bearing wear, this misalignment accelerates capital erosion by {{erosion}}%.
alerts.axial_breach: Measured {{value}} mm exceeds max limit of {{limit}} mm. Driving high dynamic thrust loads on pads, risking catastrophic fatigue breakthrough.
alerts.insulation_risk: Stator resistance of {{value}} MOhm is below the strict Healthy Baseline of {{limit}} MOhm. High probability of winding partial discharge.
alerts.oil_chemistry: {{condition}}. Accelerated chemical erosion of Babbitt (white metal) bearings detected.
alerts.cavitation: DIAGNOSIS: Potential Cavitation. REASONING: Specific Water Consumption ({{swc}}) is > 10% above design baseline.
alerts.fatigue_risk: INVESTMENT DECAY ALERT: Dynamic fatigue risk is {{risk}}%. Failure to correct alignment/vibration will result in accelerated capital erosion.

verdicts.critical_multi: CRITICAL: Asset requires immediate intervention across {{count}} failure domains; prioritize shutdown and comprehensive audit before further operation.
verdicts.structural_mech: Asset shows compounded structural and mechanical degradation; immediate engineering review required to prevent cascading failure.
verdicts.mech_trib: Asset is structurally sound but tribologically compromised; prioritize oil filtration and precision realignment to arrest longevity leak.
verdicts.thermal_mech: Thermal stress detected with alignment deviation; bearing wear accelerating—recommend laser realignment and thermography baseline.
verdicts.mech_only: Alignment precision below Golden Standard (0.05 mm/m); execute laser realignment protocol to restore full longevity potential.
verdicts.elec_only: Electrical insulation degradation detected; schedule stator dry-out and partial discharge testing within 30 days.
verdicts.trib_only: Oil analysis indicates contamination; implement enhanced filtration and consider oil change to prevent accelerated bearing wear.
verdicts.warning_only: Asset operating within acceptable limits with {{count}} monitoring flag(s); maintain current inspection cadence.
verdicts.golden: Asset meets NC-4.2 Heritage Standards; projected 50-year longevity pathway confirmed—continue predictive monitoring.
verdicts.nominal: Asset health nominal with no immediate action required; next scheduled audit recommended in 6 months.

errors.seq_001: Foundational Error: Draft Tube must be installed first.
errors.seq_002: Support Error: Spiral Case requires Draft Tube foundation.
errors.seq_003: Load Path Error: Stay Ring must rest on Spiral Case.
errors.seq_004: ERR_SEQ_004: Guide vanes (Wicket Gates) must be installed before Top Cover.
errors.seq_005: Clearance Error: Head Cover required before Rotor insertion.
